content: I'm still deciding on the display, but I think I'll go with the 4K OLED option. I've heard it's really good for watching movies and browsing the web. By the way, I've been using my new Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra and Fossil Gen 5 smartwatch together, and it's been a great experience. The smartwatch has been tracking my fitness goals really well, and I love receiving notifications on my wrist. Speaking of fitness, can you recommend some good fitness apps that work well with the Fossil Gen 5 smartwatch?
